summary: Travel the high seas in style, with new banners to adorn your ship.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/LogoTWCNC.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionDES.png[/img]

Tamriellic Craftworks is an expansion on the idea behind my Tamriellic Glassworks mod for Oblivion; It is intended as an aesthetic overhaul of Skyrim, based on the concepts of region, culture and materials. This addon for Northern Cardinal by swordboy replaces the "Northern Cardinal" and "Pirate" banners found abord ship, and is intended as a sample of Tamriellic Craftworks. It will be merged into the project as an option when the core release is ready for public consumption.

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionREQ.png[/img]

[list][*][size=2]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54956/?]Northern Cardinal by swordboy[/url][/size][/*]
[/list]
[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionINS.png[/img]

NMM Installation:

[list][*][size=2]Activate in Nexus Mod Manager.[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Follow on-screen instructions.[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Overwrite any files when prompted.[/size]
[/*][/list]
Manual Installation:

[list][*][size=2]Open mod archive.[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Select your texture resolution option from the "00" folders.[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Open your selected folder and extract to your Skyrim Data folder.[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Overwrite any files when prompted.[/size]
[/*][/list]
[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionINC.png[/img]

[list][*][size=2]None known.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionUSA.png[/img]

This plugin may not be uploaded to any distribution site without my permission. In the event that this plugin is removed from Nexus, this plugin may be uploaded to any distribution site without my permission, with the exception of Steamworks, so long as the files contained within remain unchanged.

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionCON.png[/img]

If you need to reach me, you can contact me on the Nexus forums, under the name Ph0rce (my email is in my 
profile), or through my website at www.ndavidteixeira.com

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/TCW/Graphics/SectionTHA.png[/img]

I want to thank Bethesda Softworks for creating The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. I would also like to thank swordboy for creating the original Northern Cardinal mod that inspired this sub-project. Last but not least, I would like to thank the fine community at Nexus for continuing to download and support mods like this.
author: Oriius
